Text.Page:
The {@LinkCreature:10#17#naga clawmaster} tears everything apart, leaving only chunks of meat where an entire squad of soldiers once stood.

On the other hand, I'm told you're no ordinary soldier, .

So prove it. Take those nagas out.
I set the challenge, and you overcame it. That's the kind of fighting <PCCLASS:lcase> I like to see around here.

You know, maybe the {@LinkCreature:10#17#clawmasters} are too frightening.

That would explain your reluctance to follow a direct order, wouldn't it?
